aspect: 1. Patrick Kluivert makes a winning start in World Cup qualifying as coach of Curacao.
2. Curacao advanced to the second qualifying round in CONCACAF for the 2018 tournament.
3. Kluivert's team won 2-1 on Saturday in Willemstad and faces Cuba in the next round.
explain: In the case of World Cup qualifiers, Patrick Kluivert demonstrates an effective start to his coaching career with Curacao as they successfully advance to the second qualifying round in CONCACAF, winning a series of games and outshining their competition.

Curacao has secured a spot in the second qualifying round of CONCACAF for the 2018 football tournament following their remarkable victory against Montserrat with a score of 4-3 on aggregate, aided by Patrick Kluivert's exceptional performance.

Patrick Kluivert's team, representing the Caribbean island, recently won 4-3 on aggregate against Montserrat, securing their progress to the second qualifying round in CONCACAF. In the next round, Kluivert's team defeated Cuba by a score of 2-1 on Saturday in Willemstad.
